author: Times Of India
title: Little Arunachal girl's message wins hearts
description: nine-year-old girl of Arunachal Pradesh has urged everyone to stay indoors during the 21-day lockdown period and help his father, who is a policeman and is currently away from home on duty.
content:
A sweet little girl, daughter of a Policeman in Arunachal Pradesh with an emotional yet powerful message. Let's app https://t.co/Hq4bHhfi4D
